get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Answer resources.

GetAnswerItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/answers/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Category resources.

GetCategoryItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/categories/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Results resources.

GetResultsItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/results/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Task resources.

GetTaskItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/tasks/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Test resources.

GetTestItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/tests/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of TryTest resources.

GetTryTestItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/try_tests/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of User resources.

GetUserItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/users/{id}`.
